version.name: v1
version.xform: <xf:xforms xmlns:xf="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xf:model> <xf:instance id="babycare"> <babycare name="BabyCare-v1" id="2"> <baby_name/> <baby_age/> <formtype>data_entry</formtype> </babycare> </xf:instance> <xf:bind id="baby_name" nodeset="/babycare/baby_name" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="baby_age" nodeset="/babycare/baby_age" type="xsd:int"/> <xf:bind id="formtype" nodeset="/babycare/formtype" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> </xf:model> <xf:group id="1"> <xf:label>Page1</xf:label> <xf:input bind="baby_name"> <xf:label>Baby's name?</xf:label> <xf:hint>name</xf:hint> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="baby_age"> <xf:label>Baby's Age</xf:label> <xf:hint>Baby's age</xf:hint> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formtype"> <xf:label>formtype</xf:label> </xf:input> </xf:group> </xf:xforms>
